AuthPrompt.title: Join the Action
AuthPrompt.subtitle: You need to be logged in to place a bet.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I create a bet?
faq.a1: Go to the Create page, fill in the details of your prediction, set the odds and pool amount, and publish.
faq.a2: Winners are determined based on the verification source specified in the bet. Our oracle system verifies the outcome.
faq.a3: You can only cancel a bet if no one has participated in it yet.

BetModal.title: Place Your Bet
BetModal.disclaimerText: You can only bet up to the current pool amount. Your bet will be added to the pool.

Create.title: Create Prediction
Create.subtitle: Formulate your insight and back it with conviction.
Create.createFromExistingDesc: Choose a bet to use as template
Create.aiDesc: Just speak your prediction. I'll structure it, suggest odds, and fill the form for you.
Create.aiDisclaimer: *Disclaimer: AI suggestions are not financial advice.*

form.title: Title
form.titlePlaceholder: e.g., Bitcoin to hit $100k by Q4 2025

Pick.titleCreate: Choose a bet to use as template
Pick.subtitleCreate: Select a prediction to base your new bet on. We'll pre-fill the form for you.
Pick.subtitleShare: Select a prediction to view details and share the link.

Rating.title: Leaderboard
Rating.subtitle: The top predictors by earnings and activity. Compete with the best minds on the platform.

Register.title: Prove your point.
Register.subtitle: Join a community of intellectuals where every opinion matters and has value.

validation.passwordLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

Login.title: Welcome back.
Login.subtitle: Continue your journey of predictions and intellectual debates.

step1.title: What interests you?
step1.subtitle: Select topics so we can personalize your feed.

step2.title: How will you participate?
step2.subtitle: This will help us find suitable bets for you.

active.title: Actively debating
active.description: I'm ready to take risks and prove my point with money.

casual.title: Sometimes
casual.description: I only participate in the most interesting events.

observer.title: Just observing
observer.description: I want to follow trends and public opinion.

BetComments.title: Comments
BetComments.noComments: No comments yet. Be the first!

Wallet.title: Wallet
Wallet.subtitle: Manage your tokens and transactions
Wallet.depositNote: PRR will be added to your balance immediately

Referral.title: Referral Program
Referral.subtitle: Invite friends and earn PRR
Referral.howItWorksDesc: Share your referral code with friends. When they sign up and place bets, you earn PRR!

Home.subtitle: Join the premier prediction market. Validate your insights, earn reputation, and engage in intellectual debate.
Home.noResultsDesc: Try adjusting your search or filters

createBetForm.title: Create Bet
createBetForm.registerPrompt: Sign up to create a bet

errors.poolAmountPositive: Pool amount must be greater than 0

empty.title: No predictions found
empty.desc: You haven't made any predictions in this category yet.

Settings.title: Settings
Settings.deleteAccountDesc: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. Please be certain.

Share.title: Share Profile
Share.subtitle: Show your stats to the world
Share.shareBetDesc: Choose a prediction to share its link

Footer.description: The premier prediction market for intellectual debate and insights.
Footer.newsletterDesc: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest market trends.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To democratize truth through efficient prediction markets.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where accuracy and insight are rewarded over noise.

values.title: Core Values
values.transparencyDesc: All transactions are visible and verifiable.
values.integrityDesc: We uphold the highest standards of fairness.
values.innovationDesc: Pushing the boundaries of social betting.

basics.title: Basics
basics.point1: Create or join a prediction pool.
basics.point2: Place your bet on an outcome.

settlement.title: Settlement
settlement.description: Markets are settled based on verifiable public information sources.

disputes.title: Disputes
disputes.description: Disputes are handled by our governance council.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing Parier, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

eligibility.title: Eligibility
eligibility.content: You must be at least 18 years old to use this platform.

account.title: Account Security
account.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account.

collection.title: Data Collection
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us.

usage.title: Data Usage
usage.content: We use your data to improve our services.

protection.title: Data Protection
protection.content: We implement security measures to protect your information.
